description.name: ./desc1
description.validateValue: function(field){var temp=this.getValue();if(temp.length>158){this.markInvalid("Description should not exceed 150 characters");return false;}else if(temp.length == 0){this.markInvalid("Enter Description");return false;}else{this.clearInvalid();return true;}}
